attributes.action: To stop the unjustified persecution of British Troops past and present.
attributes.background: Our Troops have been sent into many theatres to protect the citizens of this country. They do not deserve to be hounded for doing their jobs whilst the people who send them there go Scott free.

rejection.details: We're not sure what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to give all British troops immunity from prosecution.
